title: build an app
desc: Hi my name is Chris and I am a running coach. I want to develop an app my athletes can use to execute and record their interval training sessions. I would like to be able to design sessions and send them to them for them to follow. For example one of my athletes interval sessions may be to run fast for 1 minute then run slow for 200m, fast for 500m and then slow for 2 minutes and to repeat this set 3 times, or another set example may be to run 200m fast and rest for 1 minute then run 400m fast and rest for 2 minutes and repeat this set 7 times. I need the app to tell the runner when to stop and when to start. I would like the app to record speed (km an hour, minutes a km), time (moving and stationary), distance, GPS map, elevation, cadence (steps per minute), splits, heart rate (integrate device options), calories, time activity started and finished. GPX file for route. I would like to be able to create complicated interval sessions and send/give them to my athletes so when they run the interval session all they have to do is start and stop running when their app tells them too. I would like the display to show the activity breakdown so they know what will be coming next for the rest of the interval session.

title: fix app sending many requests in a music app IOS
desc: Hello, attached you will see that my IOS app has an issue of sending too many requests to play music from my server. attached you will see how a web browser vs android vs ios send requests to Apache. this is causing the apache and server to go down and having me to restart my VPS each time a user (IP ADDRESS) drains the power of VPS due to his/her app sending high amount of requests, for example someone the other day from his IOS app send 10,000 requests to play 1 song!!! i do not know how this is possible but it happened.i need someone to find the bug causing this while also examining the app sending requests to server more closely. the IOS app is technically DDOSing the serveri am also firing my IOS developer and in need of an IOS developer to work with my app project manager in China who handle the Server, Android, Web, API, and everything else except the IOS app.

title: Build mobile React-Native Social Media platform.
desc: Offer yourself if your the best React-Native developer you know!!Very experienced developers only!!Only developers with previous experience in social media apps, please provide links for the apps and portfolio.Dead line of 2 month (Or offer yours before hiring).(iOS/Android)Looking for a react-native developer to build from scratch a big social media platform,Please offer yourself only if you have a lot experience with:- Redux- Navigation- Facebook SDK- Advanced CSS handling in React-Native- Device permission handling- Animation and animated components- Implement design in very high level occuratness- Background services and workers- Notifications- Camera SDK- Video Edit (Thumnailing and cropping & filtering)- Image Edit (Cropping and filtering)- Amazing caching ability- Smooth and slick app feeling- Fetch (Ajax) working.- GIT- Map SDK- Drawing shapes and very unusual componentsThe app will include:- Multi color theme (2 Colors, light and dark)- Notification center- Chats- Map- Profile- Video and image playing- Pre-fetching in background for smoothing feeling- Background services and workersIt's going to be challenging:The app includes 30+- API Webservices to call to,And around 18 Screens.Creative mind is needed to offer things, and think of new features!App should work perfectly on both Platforms (iOS\Android)! - check your modules on both platforms before use them.- API Documentation is present to use.- Developer Specification Document is present to use.I know its boring - but reading the all Developer specification document is required (30 pages).Please note: Document might be missing - and will be filled during work.The developer need to be able to work with GIT and commit & push each stage (So we can also see your progress),Use Expo & Testflight and more.Be avaliable at any working time.Developer should know how to write advanced, clean, understandable and efficient code, The code will be review by me (CEO & CTO) before pushed,Please note - low level code will not be accepted!! (If the general code will be bad, a payment won't be made).NOTE!!: The app is already at 15%+- progress, you will get a ready basic unfinished infrastructure.Please get help from our designer to implement the design.The developer should acknowledge that many changed may be happens during the developing stage.

title: Android App + Bluetooth data feed + Graph plotting + PDF report
desc: We need a developer to code an Android app with the following requirements.1. Display a collection of serialized numeric values received via Bluetooth in real time.2. Plot a graph with some of this values and update it as soon as new values are received.3. Track a collection of any new values received, from user press start button to user press stop button.4. Generate a PDF report including a graph plotting all tracked values and some overview data.5. Allow common options for sharing that report file.6. Show some warnings on certain situations based in received values.7. Settings or preferences screen to allow simple customizations, such prefered units metric/imperial, selecting logo image and store company contact details for filling the PDF file header.We provide the overal graphic design and any single image or icon needed during development.This app must display correctly in any Android device with 5 inch or bigger screen.The developer will work side by side with our team and must report daily to our assigned project manager.Deadline: 2-3 weeks.
